alldb.table_sql: SELECT PI.ID id, BCS.STATUS_NAME projstatus, PI.PROJ_DATE projdate, PI.PROJ_ID projid, PI.PROJECT_NAME projectname, CUST.CUST_NAME custname, TD.NAME_ dept, tdd.name_ projsource, U.REALNAME_ projmanager, pi.PROJ_MANAGE projmanage, pi.PROJ_DEPT projdept FROM PROJ_INFO PI LEFT JOIN BASE_CONTRACT_STATUS BCS ON BCS.STATUS_CODE = PI.PROJ_STATUS LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CUST ON CUST.ID = PI.CUST_ID left join T_DICTS_DATAS tdd on tdd.id_ = pi.proj_source left join T_USERS U ON U.ID_ = PI.PROJ_REGISTRAR LEFT JOIN T_DEPTS TD ON TD.ID_ = PI.PROJ_DEPT WHERE 1=1 /~projstatus: and PI.PROJ_STATUS ='{projstatus}'~/ /~custname: and CUST.CUST_NAME like '%{custname}%' ~/ /~projid: and PI.PROJ_ID like '%{projid}%' ~/ /~projmanager: and U.REALNAME_ like '%{projmanager}%' ~/ /~projectname: and PI.PROJECT_NAME like '%{projectname}%' ~/ /~projdateStart: and PI.PROJ_DATE >= '{projdateStart}' ~/ /~projdateEnd: and PI.PROJ_DATE <= '{projdateEnd}' ~/ /~projectname: and PI.PROJECT_NAME like '%{projectname}%' ~/ <EXTRACTEND>order by projid desc<EXTRACTEND>
